channel.title: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor
channel.description: So i got the retail version of black mesa and while playing i was seen this alot [url]https://imgur.com/a/c3tjI[/url] and the HECU helmets are going mulicolored but say its becuase of the lighting or some thing so is there way to fix this or do you all ready know aboutthe bug

item.title: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor
item.dc:creator: Kermit_the_Forg
item.description:
Verify your game cache. This happened to me after the last big update and that’s how I fixed it.

Read full topic
item.source: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor

item.title: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor
item.dc:creator: Dalek
item.description:
I’m also getting the HECU helmet bug

I have no mods that affect the HECU textures installed

Read full topic
item.source: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor

item.title: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Do you have any mods installed?

to fix the ties put the following in the developer console:

cl_jigglebone_framerate_cutoff 0

Read full topic
item.source: Crazy ties and HECU helmets mulitcolor
